credit_line: Gift of Philadelphia Museum of Art
title: Sidewall
description: a) On beige ground, rectangles arranged like building blocks or brick, each with a central motif with floral center. "Block" pattern interrupted by reserves with alternating two-handled epergne and bunch of grapes. b) duplicate, on pale green ground, with shades of green, red and white. Printed in selvedge"T S Co. (thistle) 9909"
name: Sidewall
